languages.text: "Благодарю. Я не подвергаю сомнению вашу лояльность, но метод выбора жертв, которые вы используете... заставляет меня быть осторожным".
"Thank you. I do not doubt your loyalty, but your method for selecting victims... makes me wary."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю. Я не подвергаю сомнению вашу лояльность, но метод выбора жертв, которые вы используете... заставляет меня быть осторожным".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you. I do not doubt where your loyalties lie, but the ease with which you commit murder... makes me wary."
"Thank you. I do not doubt where your loyalties lie, but the ease with which you commit murder... makes me wary."
"Thank you. I do not doubt where your loyalties lie, but the ease with which you commit murder... makes me wary."
"Thank you. I do not doubt where your loyalties lie, but the ease with which you commit murder... makes me wary."
"Thank you. I do not doubt your loyalty, but your method for selecting victims... makes me wary."
"Thank you. I do not doubt your loyalty, but your method for selecting victims... makes me wary."
"Thank you. I do not doubt your loyalty, but your method for selecting victims... makes me wary."

languages.text: "Danke. Ich zweifle nicht an Eurer Loyalität, aber Eure Methode, Opfer auszuwählen ... lässt mich aufhorchen."
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I do not doubt your loyalty, but your method for selecting victims... makes me wary."

traits.locale_text: "Danke. Ich zweifle nicht an Eurer Loyalität, doch die Leichtigkeit, mit der Ihr einen Mord begeht ... macht mich vorsichtig."

languages.text: « Merci. Je ne doute pas de votre loyauté, mais la façon dont vous sélectionnez vos victimes... m'incite à rester sur mes gardes. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I do not doubt your loyalty, but your method for selecting victims... makes me wary."

traits.locale_text: « Merci. Je ne doute pas de votre loyauté, mais l'aisance avec laquelle vous semez la mort... m'incite à rester sur mes gardes. »

languages.text: «Gracias. No dudo de su lealtad, pero su forma de seleccionar a sus víctimas... me preocupa».
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I do not doubt your loyalty, but your method for selecting victims... makes me wary."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias. No dudo de su lealtad, pero su facilidad para el asesinato... exige cautela».

languages.text: 「ありがとうございます。あなたの忠誠心を疑っているわけではありませんが、被害者を選ぶ方法には…用心させられます」
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I do not doubt your loyalty, but your method for selecting victims... makes me wary."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとう。 あなたの忠誠心がどこにあるかは疑わないが、簡単に殺人を犯すその態度は…不安になる」

languages.text: “谢谢您。我毫不怀疑您的忠诚，但您选择罪人的方式……却让我不得不心生警惕。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I do not doubt your loyalty, but your method for selecting victims... makes me wary."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你。我毫不怀疑你的忠诚，但你杀人如此干脆利落……这让我不得不心生警惕。”

languages.original_text: "Thank you. I do not doubt your loyalty, but your method for selecting victims... makes me wary."

languages.text: "Teşekkürler. Sadakatinden kuşkum yok fakat kurbanlarını seçme yöntemin... Beni endişelendiriyor."
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I do not doubt your loyalty, but your method for selecting victims... makes me wary."
